entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 28 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 28 by morning. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:12 PM MST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Periods of light snow beginning in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 26. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:12 PM MST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 27. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late in the evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h before morning. Temperature steady near minus 27. Wind chill minus 35 in the evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 5:12 PM MST Friday 06 January 2023
